nodes.text: Blade was a shuttle serving in Moff Sarne's forces. Imperial Survey 1982376 claimed to have crashed the shuttle on the planet Demonsgate.

The shuttle Blade may not exist; it is clear during the adventure, Showdown, that the transmission from Imperial Survey 1982376 is a faked distress signal to draw the FarStar into an ambush on the planet Demonsgate.
